amendment.description: Amendment maintains access to National Forest System lands for snowmobilers while a winter travel management rule for National Forests is finalized.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 113-339 to maintain access to National Forest System lands for snowmobilers while a winter Travel Management Rule for National Forests is finalized.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Polis.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
